title: Legacy Client Bug?
body:
Legacy client seems to be having trouble doing what it's supposed to do:

- Chat does not work
- Friend list does not work (the whole bottom right corner is contently flashing)
- Hextech crafting has gone missing

Not sure if it is just me, but these are some major problems I've came across so far after 6.23 patch

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you attempted [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6), has this resolved your issue?
